Key Match Events: Belgium 0-1 Slovakia (Schranz scored an early goal)
Romelu Lukaku had two goals disallowed by VAR
Belgium struggled defensively, particularly in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: Tedesco refused to criticize officials after the loss
Belgium will still back themselves to qualify for the last 16, but are under pressure
Slovakia played with greater moxie and desire, which led to the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivan Schranz's goal was the only one of the match
Romelu Lukaku was denied twice by VAR for offside and handball
Belgium's performance was lackluster compared to their usual standards
